name: 吳庭育
objective:
學生們將於本課程中先學習到關聯式資料庫的基本知識，包含各種運算邏輯、資料表操作、查詢篩選、SQL與進階應用，內容包含資料庫、表格、索引的建立與維護。資料庫的新增、修改與刪除敘述，基礎、結合與子查詢敘述等等。並進階學習NoSQL大數據資料庫 MongoDB，讓學生可以了解到未來主流的大數據資料庫應用。

In the course, students will acquire basic knowledge of relational database, including computational logics, datasheet manipulation, search/sieve, SQL and other advanced applications. The course content consists of the following aspects: establishing and maintaining the databases, datasheets and indexes; creating new databases; modifying and deleting descriptions; and generating, combining and describing subqueries. Moreover, students will get to know the NoSQL bigdata MongoDB, the mainstream in the future.
schedule:
Week 1：資料庫系統簡介 / Introduction of Database System
Week 2：關聯式資料庫的基礎知識 / Basic Concepts of Relational Database 
Week 3：資料庫管理SQL / SQL Management
Week 4：資料維護SQL / SQL Maintenance 
Week 5：資料查詢SQL / SQL Search
Week 6：SQL函數應用設計 / SQL Functions: Design and Applications
Week 7：整合式查詢SQL技術：Integrated SQL Search
Week 8：觸發式SQL指令設計：Triggered SQL Commands
Week 9: 期中小專題 / Midterm Project 
Week 10：模組式SQL設計：預儲程序 / SQL Modularization: Stored Procedures
Week 11：JSON Function & SELECT
Week 12：大數據資料庫介紹 / Introduction of Big Data Database
Week 13：MongoDB資料庫管理介紹 / MongoDB Management
Week 14：MongoDB基本操作 / MongoDB Operations
Week 15：Neo4j 圖資料庫介紹 / Neo4j Graph Database
Week 16：Neo4j 基本操作 / Neo4j Operations
Week 17：Neo4j 資料庫管理 / Neo4j Management
Week 18：期末專題 / Final Project
